help: Drop images here or just click
are-you-sure: Are you sure you want to remove this image from server? This cannot be undone.
why: Why img.bi is secure and awesome?
are-you-sure-autorm: Are you sure you want view this image? This image will be remove after that.
cryptography-text: Images are encrypted using AES-256 with random key in your browser before upload. Nobody can view your images, even people who have direct access to servers. We also use TLS which defend you from Man-in-the-Middle attacks.
open-source-text: We believe that only open source crypto is acceptable, so all source code of img.bi is available on GitHub under GPLv3 license.
privacy-text: We do not store any logs, except SHA-3 hash of uploader's IP address with random salt for a day. But our hosting provider and systems like SORM, NarusInsight, Titan traffic database and other can store their own logs. Be careful.
filezile: Sorry, filesize over 3 MiB is not allowed
ads-descr: We use kokoku as an ad rotator. Your can select language of pages where your ads will be shown.
no-violate-privacy: Nothing that can violate privacy of img.bi users.
nothing-illegal: Nothing illegal in NL on banner.
no-pop-unders: No pop-unders, pop-ups and other bad things.
accept: We accept Bitcoin, Litecoin and much more payment systems.
embed-js: Embed images from sites based on img.bi software.
